subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Tests and Testing
Horses
lead_paragraph: The announcement of stiff penalties for drug cheats signaled that the Breeders’ Cup wants to align the event with the more stringent regulations in place in Europe.
snippet: The announcement of stiff penalties for drug cheats signaled that the Breeders’ Cup wants to align the event with the more stringent regulations in place in Europe.
